title: Nepal Telecom Billing System Corruption
description:
The Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) filed a corruption case on June 8, 2025, against 18 individuals associated with Nepal Telecom (NT). The case centers on alleged irregularities and corruption in the procurement and extension of the contract for NT's 'Convergent Real-Time Billing and Customer Support Billing System'.

The primary allegation is that the accused colluded to cause significant financial loss to the state-owned utility. Instead of issuing a competitive tender for a new billing system, the NT board of directors, on January 8, 2023, decided to extend the Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC) with the existing vendor, Asia Info Linkage Technologies (China) Inc., for four to five years. This contract, valued at approximately NRs 3.15 billion, was allegedly awarded in 'bad faith' with 'unnatural price rates' and without a competitive process.

The CIAA's investigation concluded that this non-competitive contract extension led to the misappropriation of public assets. The anti-graft body has filed the case at the Special Court in Kathmandu, seeking to recover NRs 334,817,430 in damages and an additional NRs 98.8 million claimed as a direct loss.

The individuals charged include:

  • Sunil Paudel (Former Managing Director, Nepal Telecom)
  • Sangita Pahadi (Incumbent Managing Director, Nepal Telecom)
  • Pratibha Baidya (Then Technical Officer, Nepal Telecom)
  • Rajendra Shrestha (Chief Financial Officer, Nepal Telecom)
  • Jhabindra Lal Upadhyaya (Chief Operating Officer, Nepal Telecom)
  • Binita Shrestha (Director, Nepal Telecom)
  • Amul Pradhan (Acting Director, Nepal Telecom)
  • Devendra Khatiwada (Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Rajib Kumar KC (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Santosh Kumar Shrestha (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Nawal Chaudhary (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Mukti Prasad Aryal (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Hemprabha Ram Pratap Karna (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Pramatma Bhattarai (Deputy Manager, Nepal Telecom)
  • Long Yong (Senior Director, Asia Info Yunghang Software (Beijing) Limited)
  • Huang Wei (Yellow) (Then Project Manager, Asia Info Yunghang Software (Beijing) Limited)
  • Shailesh Shrestha (Director, Arniko International Pvt Ltd - local agent)
  • Another unnamed official from Asia Info Linkage Technologies (China) Inc.

This case is notable as Sunil Paudel was already convicted in a separate case related to the procurement of the National Payment Gateway and faces other corruption charges.
unverified_info:
• Initial reports suggested an annual loss of NRs 3 billion, which appears to be an exaggeration. News sources clarify the total contract value was approximately NRs 3.15 billion over five years, with claimed damages by the CIAA being significantly lower (around NRs 433.6 million in total).
  • The year '2079' mentioned in early documents corresponds to the Gregorian calendar year 2022/2023, specifically aligning with the contract signing in December 2022 (Poush 2079).
  • Some early information mentioned a 'substandard system' (कमसल प्रणाली), but the official charges filed by the CIAA focus primarily on financial irregularities, non-competitive bidding, and inflated pricing rather than the technical performance of the billing system.
key_allegations: Awarding a contract without competitive bidding
Inflating contract price for personal gain
Causing financial loss to a state-owned entity

locations.other: Case filed at the Special Court

timeline.title: Contract Signed with Asia Info
timeline.description: A contract worth approximately NRs 3.15 billion is signed with Chinese company Asia Info to maintain Nepal Telecom's billing system for five years. The exact date in December is not specified, so the end of the month is used as an approximation.

timeline.title: NT Board Approves AMC Extension
timeline.description: The Nepal Telecom board of directors makes a formal decision to sign a four-year Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC) with Asia Info, with an option for a one-year extension, rather than initiating a new competitive tender process.

timeline.title: CIAA Files Corruption Case
timeline.description: The Commission for the Investigation of Abuse of Authority (CIAA) files a corruption case at the Special Court in Kathmandu against 18 individuals, including former MD Sunil Paudel and incumbent MD Sangita Pahadi.
